summary: Retcon incorrect world-state notes from a retired PC timeline: Galmar Stone-Fist is NOT dead; Thieves Guild / Goldenglow progress has NOT occurred for Oskern.

conflicts_resolved.conflict: World state claimed Galmar Stone-Fist was slain during the Battle of Whiterun.
conflicts_resolved.resolution: Galmar Stone-Fist is alive and continues commanding Stormcloak forces.

conflicts_resolved.conflict: World state claimed Goldenglow Estate was sabotaged and Aringoth's safe robbed (Thieves Guild progress).
conflicts_resolved.resolution: Remove these progress markers; Thieves Guild / Goldenglow job has not been completed in Oskern's timeline.

conflicts_resolved.conflict: World state referenced a Thieves-Guild-adjacent codename ('Dream Catcher of Dusk') as an active Thalmor threat.
conflicts_resolved.resolution: Remove the retired-PC codename; replace with a generic Thalmor surveillance pressure relevant to Oskern and the College.

file_changes.change: Remove incorrect major_events/rumors/active_threats/notes and replace with corrected Galmar-alive and non-Thieves-Guild-progress state.

gm_notes: This patch preserves module content (Thieves Guild encounters/quests still exist) but clears any implied completion/progress for the active PC timeline. If future sessions involve the Thieves Guild, treat all related jobs as unstarted.
